tool_description: This Forex API delivers live currency rates, economic news, and both market sentiment indicators and real trader sentiment. Make smarter forex decisions and build powerful applications.
name: Forex API
title: Forex API

api_list.name: Economic Calendar Options
api_list.description: See all allowed values for the two URL-queries in the **Economic Calendar** endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://forex-api2.p.rapidapi.com/economic-calendar/parameter-options"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "forex-api2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://forex-api2.p.rapidapi.com/economic-calendar/parameter-options"

headers = {

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Economic Calendar
api_list.description:
**Never Miss a Market Mover: Stay Ahead of the Curve with Our Economic Calendar**

Stay informed and capitalize on opportunities with our comprehensive economic calendar. This essential tool equips you to:

- **Track Key Events:** Access a detailed listing of past, present, and upcoming economic news releases that can significantly impact currency valuations.

- **Go Beyond Dates:** Our calendar doesn't just list events, it empowers you with context. 

- **Prioritize Impact:** Quickly identify high-importance events that have the potential to cause significant market volatility for specific currency pairs.

**Make Informed Decisions:**

By proactively planning your trades around key economic events, you can:

- **Anticipate Market Reactions:** Prepare for potential price movements triggered by news releases.

- **Identify Trading Opportunities:** Economic data can unveil underlying economic strengths and weaknesses, potentially creating profitable trading opportunities.

- **Minimize Risk:** Being aware of major economic events allows you to adjust your trading positions or avoid entering the market altogether during periods of high volatility.

**Gain a Competitive Edge:**

Our economic calendar is a valuable asset for any forex trader, providing the knowledge and foresight needed to navigate the ever-changing economic landscape and make informed trading decisions.

optional_parameters.name: includeVolatilities
optional_parameters.description:
Filter results by only returning specific impact on a currency.

Can be empty if every volatility-impact needs to be returned. 
You can set multiple volatilities by seperating them with a semicolon.

Check out the **Economic Calendar Options** for all allowed values

optional_parameters.name: includeCountries
optional_parameters.description:
Filter results by only returning specific countries.

Can be empty if every country will be returned. 
You can set multiple countries by seperating them with a semicolon.

Check out the **Economic Calendar Options** for all allowed values

api_list.name: Technical Sentiment
api_list.description:
This endpoint harnesses the power of widely recognized technical indicators to provide a snapshot of the current market sentiment for each forex pair.

**What's Included?**
- **Indicator Analysis:** Leverage the insights from established technical indicators like [list a few examples of your supported indicators.

- **Daily Sentiment:** Gain a quick understanding of whether the indicator data suggests a bullish, bearish, or neutral outlook for each pair.

**Boost Your Trading Strategy:**

- **Confirm Trends:** Use technical sentiment alongside live price data to confirm or challenge potential trends.

- **Identify Entry and Exit Points:** Indicator analysis can guide you towards potential entry and exit points for your trades.
Make Data-Driven Decisions: Combine technical sentiment with other analysis techniques for a well-rounded trading approach.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://forex-api2.p.rapidapi.com/sentiment/technical"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "forex-api2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Trader Sentiment
api_list.description:
This endpoint unlocks valuable insights into how real forex traders are positioned. It provides the current distribution of long trades vs. short trades for each currency pair.

By understanding how the crowd is leaning, you can:

- **Identify  potential contrarian opportunities:** If a large number of traders are positioned long on a pair, it might indicate a chance to go short (and vice versa).

- **Gauge market confidence:** A high concentration of long or short positions could signal strong directional bias.
Refine your trading strategy: Use this data as one piece of the puzzle alongside technical and fundamental analysis.
api_list.code:

url = "https://forex-api2.p.rapidapi.com/sentiment/trader"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }

print(response.json())
